name: Revira e Volta
description:
Controls:

  • WASD/arrow keys: move
  • Space bar: jump
  • Shift: sprint
  • Ctrl: crouch
  • Mouse Left Click & Drag: pickup objects
  • R key: restart the level

In "Revira e Volta", you are a thief breaking into people's houses in Porto Alegre, a city in the southern region of Brazil. Your boss has given you an order to rob a specific item in each home, and you must do so without leaving any trace of your presence!

Use the mouse controls to toss items around while you look for the item. Once you find it, click on it to collect it. Before you can leave the house, though, you have to make sure everything you moved is put back into their place! You don't want to get caught, after all.

Diversificadores Diversos:

Utilizamos o diversificador de "Linguagens do Brasil" - criando casas decoradas com itens característicos do Rio Grande do Sul: cuia, bomba (o primeiro item a ser roubado pelo jogador é uma bomba dourada), cacetinho (pão francês), churrasqueira, espetos, e muitas outras referências!

Credits:

Developed by Diogo Müller and Julia Melgare. Original 3D assets created by Lisandra Simões Pires. Huge thank you to José Blotta for the initial game idea.

SFX obtained from freesound.org. BGM is Raw Jazz by Mastermind. Special thank you to Gabriel Marques for the radio easter egg narration.

We would also like to thank all of the mentors in the jam who gave us feedback and suggestions. Our game wouldn't be the same without them!
